Text: Thus, on 5 July 1841, some 500 passengers travelled by a special train for the 24-mile round trip, paying a shilling apiece.
Cause: Thus, on 5 July 1841, some 500 passengers travelled by a special train for the 24-mile round trip
Sentence: <e1>Thus, on 5 July 1841, some 500 passengers travelled by a special train for the 24-mile round trip</e1>, <e2>paying a shilling apiece.</e2>
